SELECT TAKER_ID , TAKE_EXAM_HISTORY_ID , SET_EXAM_QUESTION_ID , TAKER_ANSWER , TAKER_SCORE , TAKE_EXAM_ID FROM TAKE_EXAM_HISTORY
TAKE_EXAM_HISTORY_ID = ${takeExamHistoryId}

SELECT EXAM_NAME "examName" , TEH.TAKER_ID "takerId" , SET_EXAM_QUESTION_ID "setExamQuestionId" , PASSING_SCORE "passingScore" , TAKER_SCORE "takerScore" FROM TAKE_EXAM_HISTORY TEH JOIN TAKE_EXAM TE ON TEH.TAKE_EXAM_ID = TE.TAKE_EXAM_ID JOIN EXAM E ON E.EXAM_ID = TE.EXAM_ID
TEH.TAKER_ID = #{takerId} AND TE.EXAM_ID = ${examId}

SELECT EXAM_NAME "examName" , TEH.TAKER_ID "takerId" , SET_EXAM_QUESTION_ID "setExamQuestionId" , PASSING_SCORE "passingScore" , TAKER_SCORE "takerScore" FROM TAKE_EXAM_HISTORY TEH JOIN TAKE_EXAM TE ON TEH.TAKE_EXAM_ID = TE.TAKE_EXAM_ID JOIN EXAM E ON E.EXAM_ID = TE.EXAM_ID
TE.EXAM_ID = ${examId}
SELECT SUM(TAKER_SCORE) "sumTakerScore" , COUNT(*) "answerCount" FROM TAKE_EXAM_HISTORY WHERE TAKER_SCORE != 0 AND TAKE_EXAM_ID = #{takeExamId}
